messages.title: WHAT THE LIB DEMS WOULD RATHER YOU FORGET?
messages.content: Quotes from Lib Dem leader Tim Farron, and Nick Clegg.

messages.title: YOU CAN'T TRUST THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS
messages.content: You promised not to increase tuition fees, then you trebled them. You promised a fairer voting system, you gave us a referendum that backed the status quo. You promised to reform the Lords, and then packed it with more unelected peers.

issues.education: You promised not to increase tuition fees, then you trebled them.
issues.governance: You promised a fairer voting system, you gave us a referendum that backed the status quo. You promised to reform the Lords, and then packed it with more unelected peers.

quotes.text: Abortion is wrong ... Said in an interview with Salvation Army
Nick Clegg ... sees betrayal votes as least deceitful option for the country.

images.caption: Campaign leaflet from Labour targeting the Liberal Democrats.
